actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930, relating to practices in the marketing of perishable agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Provides the option of imposing a monetary penalty, not to exceed $2,000, for violations of the misbranding provisions of the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, or institution of a formal preceeding for suspension or revocation of the license issued under such Act to trade in the fruit and vegetable industry. (Amends 7 U.S.C. 499b (5))

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930, relating to practices in the marketing of perishable agricultural commodities.
